basics.name: Ankur Kelkar
basics.label: Analytics Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced Data Architect/Engineer with 10+ years in Travel Tech, Marketing Technology & Healthcare IT. Skilled in BI strategies, architectural transformation, and cost optimization. Expertise in Snowflake, dbt, Terraform, AWS services, Python, and BI tools.

highlights: Designed and implemented ETL/ELT pipelines using Python, SQL, and CI/CD
Developed reusable data extraction pipelines with S3, Lambda, SQS, SNS, EventBridge
Built Snowflake stored-procedure tasks for automated transformations
Optimized data models for BI and ML workloads
Working with Snowflake as the main Data Warehousing tool hosted on AWS.
Worked on designing and implementing multiple ETL and ELT data pipelines using programming languages like Python and SQL and automated the code deployment through CI/CD pipelines.
Created and optimized data models for the project keeping all BI and ML use cases in mind.
Created multiple reusable data extraction pipelines using AWS services like S3, Lambda, SQS, SNS, Eventbridge & CodeCommit.
Created multiple reusable data load and transformation pipelines using Snowflake Stored procedures & Tasks.
Modelled terabyte scale data across 15+ projects in dbt along with a team of three people.

Collaborated with the team to implement a Data Mesh Architecture, involving the restructuring of multiple dbt projects, establishment of new processes and standards across various domains, and educating the organization on best practices.

Pioneered an RFC (Request for Change) that improved financial data ingestion with a distributed architecture, eliminating single points of failure while delivering significant cost savings and heightened observability and robustness.
Achieved substantial cost savings of approximately 3,000 € per month by optimizing dbt pipelines through meticulous utilization of Snowflake query plans and industry best practices.
Slashed incremental data processing time by 30% through the strategic incorporation of hash-based retrieval for efficiently identifying modified data.
Elevated Looker reports' performance and precision by implementing advanced features like Aggregate Awareness, PDTs, and Parameterized table sources.
Automated invoice ingestion, improving financial data accuracy and timeliness by 40%.
Improved Kustomer and Stripe data ingestion for valuable insights and data-driven decisions.
Lead a team of 3 Analysts to solve problems for Fortune 500 companies by leveraging technographic and firmographic data.
Working on complex projects with AWS S3, AWS Athena, Presto and Python and dashboarding and visualizing data with Power BI
Running the SCRUM and maintaining sprints on JIRA
Worked on SQL Procedures Optimization for the product
Data migration from Azure SQL Datawarehouse to Snowflake

work.position: Associate Systems Analyst -> Sr. System Analyst
highlights: Lead a team of 8 analysts while managing several new and ongoing Business Intelligence and HL7 Integration projects for 5+ EHR clients while managing project timelines, resources and maintaining KPI’s.
Seamlessly collaborated with onsite managers to plan future projects and resources for multiple ambulatory care clients.
Mentored and coached team members in mastering the US Ambulatory Healthcare workflow, Allscripts EEHR, Allscripts PM
Worked on multiple HL7 Interface engines like ConnectR, Rhapsody and eLink
Collaborated with business unit teams and end users in planning and implementation of Data Migration of clinical data from Allscripts EEHR to EPIC
Creation of a Data Warehouse, packages and HL7 interfaces to facilitate a continuous data transfer of patient data in multiple stages.
Collaborated with EPIC and Oracle to plan and create a Data Warehouse for creation of patient centric and visit centric CCD’s.
Lead a team of 3 Associate Analysts in creation and export of CCD (Continuity of Care) documents.
Collaborated with a team on creating a Data Warehouse and stored procedures for migrating clinical patient data from Allscripts EEHR to EPIC
Enhanced the performance of older SSRS reports by eliminating unnecessary joins and columns.
Teamed up with Network Operations Team and created a custom SSRS report suite to pull data from SCCM & SolarWinds
Developed packages for multiple data extraction projects.
Lead developer on two Phonegap based mobile applications using variety of frameworks and toolkits and worked with jQuery, Dojo, Foundation, and databases like MYSQL and SQLite

education.institution: Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Institute of Technology
The Maharaja Sayajirao University of Baroda

skills.name: Software and Services
keywords: Looker, Power BI, SSRS, Crystal Reports, Tableu
JIRA, Confluence, Shortcut, Miro, Team Retro

keywords: Anime: Shonen, Seinen, Action, Psychological, Slice of Life, Sci-Fi
Gaming: RPGs, Narrative Driven, Simulation, Action-Adventure
Music: Old School Rock, Hard Rock, Alternative, Metal

summary_list: 7 years of experience in the US Healthcare domain and 2 years in Marketing Technology, with 1+ years in Travel Tech.
Excel in harnessing Business Intelligence Tools, SQL Services, Data Warehouses, and Python.
Proficient in cloud environments like AWS & GCP and multiple visualization software like Looker, Power BI, SSRS, Tableau.
Proficient in efficiently managing vast amounts of information, expertly employing data analysis tools and techniques to extract actionable insights and drive resultant business action.
Adept at training, coaching, and providing leadership to team members, ensuring proficiency in products and workflows.
Thrive in high-speed environments & excel under tight deadlines.
